author: deweese
msg: Bug fixes:
1) The offset for GammaTransfers was being scaled to 8bits twice.  It
is now only scaled inside GammaTransfer.
2) LinearTransfer's intersection scaling was brought in line with
GammaTransfer (the scale was moved from ConcreateComponentTransferRable
to LinearTransfer.
3) ConcreteBufferedImageCachableRed no longer uses drawImage to implement
the copyData call. This was causing an inconvenient multiply followed by
a divide out of alpha.  This would show it's self as an ugly
artifact when manipulating Turbulence images, in addition to potentially
being slow.  The data is now copied by a convince function in
GraphicsUtils.
This results in some mostly non-visible changes in reference images.
The changes should always reflect increased accuracy in the color
channels.
3) PadRed now zeros the pad regions it's self
(PadMode.ZERO_PAD). Rather than relying on drawing a rect with zero
fill.  This helps to remove the possibility for an unwanted
multiply/divide of alpha cycle.  It should also be quicker.
4) All use of the Rectangle2D.intersection functions in the filters
package are now pre-flighted with Rectangle2D.intersects.  I
noticed that createIntersection and intersection both return bogus
rectangles when called on non-intersecting rects (the code had
previously assumed an empty rect was returned).
This was detected in filterRegions.svg where zooming in a lot would
result in cases where non-visible filterRegions computed large
offscreen buffers often resulting in out of memory errors.
This fix probably needs to be pushed out to the rest of the codebase.
